sentence.Network_en: Twycross found a male tapir in Bristol.
sentence.Network_cn: 特怀克罗斯动物园在布里斯托找到了一只公貘.

sentence.Network_en: Twycross found a male tapir in Bristol, and he and Debbie are joyfully united.
sentence.Network_cn: 特怀克罗斯动物园在布里斯托找到了一只公貘.现在, 他已经和黛比快乐地结合了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 马来西亚貘 （Tapir），体型彪悍，其实是和马有情缘关系，性格温顺的食草动物，属于濒危动物。大长臂猿（Siamang），果然手臂 …
马来貘(Tapir)，很不给面子，躲在个角落里看不清楚！看了图板才知道，原来小时候跟大了花纹完全不一样……这位老外就被选中上 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: via Spanish and Portuguese from Tupi tapyra

means.word_mean: 1. large inoffensive chiefly nocturnal ungulate of tropical America and southeast Asia having a heavy body and fleshy snout
